textBeforeTable: Expand this table Collapse this table loadTOCNode(3, 'moreinformation'); loadTOCNode(2, 'moreinformation');
textAfterTable: Select an option; select or clear a check box. ALT+the letter underlined in an option Open a selected drop-down list. ALT+DOWN ARROW Select an option from a drop-down list. First letter of an option in a drop-down list. Close a selected drop-down list; cancel a command and close a dialog box. ESC Run a selected command. Enter Use edit boxes within dialog boxes Note An edit box is a blank in which you type or paste an entry, such as your user name or the path of a folder. Collapse this table Expand this table To do this Press Move to the beginning of the entry. HOME Move to the end of the entry. END Move one character to the left or right. LEFT ARROW or RIGHT ARROW Move one word to the left. CTRL+LEFT ARROW Move one word to the right. CTRL+RIGHT ARROW Select or cancel the selection of one character to the left. SHIFT+LEFT ARROW Select or cancel the selection of one character to the right. SHIFT+RIGHT ARROW Select or cancel the selection of one word to the left. CTRL+SHIFT+LEFT ARROW Select or cancel the
